name: Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique
summary: Shapes a massive dragon out of water that surges toward the target with crushing force.
technique: Mold chakra and convert to water nature.
Pull ambient water or generate from chakra to form a serpentine mass.
Guide the dragon’s head to impact and coil through the target zone.
training: Form control: practice keeping a coherent dragon head at 15m.
Flow rehearsal: sustain continuous water stream for 5 seconds.
Target steering: curve mid‑flight without shearing apart.
tips: Near lakes/rivers reduces chakra cost significantly.
Wind can disrupt the head—cast with tailwind when possible.
sourcePage: Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique

markdown.text: Water Release: Water Dragon Bullet Technique
A high‑level suiton that forms a raging dragon to smash and drown targets.

name: Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique
summary: Condenses water into a fast shark-shaped projectile that drills into the opponent.
technique: Compress water into a dense core.
Shape fins for stability and a pointed muzzle for penetration.
Release with a burst to maintain cohesion over distance.
training: Cone compression drill: reduce spread under crosswind.
Target boards at 10/20/30m for penetration consistency.
tips: Excels underwater—speed and pressure both increase.
Pairs well with clone feints to mask approach.
sourcePage: Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique

markdown.text: Water Release: Water Shark Bullet Technique
A compressive suiton projectile shaped like a shark that tears through defenses.

name: Hiding in Mist Technique
summary: Blankets the area in thick mist, obscuring vision and masking presence.
technique: Vaporize ambient moisture and thicken with controlled temperature drop.
Spread low, then rise to head height for maximum denial.
Maintain through subtle pulses to prevent dissipation.
training: Area practice: evenly cover a 20m radius.
Silent movement drills within mist to avoid telltale wakes.
tips: Wind counters—use terrain to shield mist edge.
Pair with sensory jutsu to offset visibility loss.

markdown.text: Creates a dense fog that conceals the user’s movements and suppresses enemy vision.
